label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_014
content:
## 2024-06-03 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 106
- Active: 100
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 17
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 6

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 24
- Mid Dose: 27
- High Dose: 26
- Placebo: 29

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 74.0
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 18.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 124.6
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 186.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 124.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 31.2
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 126.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 29.5
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 187.2
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 285.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 204.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 53.2
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 166.2
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 39.7
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 261.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 403.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 284.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 63.0
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 15.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 6.7
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 20.9
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 35.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 30.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 8.4

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 57.0
- Erythema Percentage: 15.5
- Swelling Percentage: 13.6
- Induration Percentage: 10.0
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 34.6

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 20.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 42.4
- Myalgia Percentage: 27.0
- Headache Percentage: 16.6
- Chills Percentage: 7.1

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 5.5
- WBC (K) SD: 1.9
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 34.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.5
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 50.0
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 5.7
- Platelets (K) Mean: 241
- Platelets (K) SD: 44
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 3.6
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 0.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.9
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.2

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-1431, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1450, Description: arthralgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1414, Description: headache, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-1498, Description: chills, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Serology samples shipped to central immunology lab
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C

### Notes
- Week 14: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 106 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
